events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has several scratches and some pixels are dead. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue has been identified as a Product Defect related to damaged screen and dead pixels.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents who will assist you further.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand your laptop screen arrived damaged, and Iâ€™m here to help resolve this.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and the shipping package so we can verify the defect and expedite the process?
I have attached the photos showing the scratches on the screen and some dead pixels. The box was intact but it looks like the damage happened inside.
Thank you for the photos. We can arrange a replacement unit at no additional cost, or offer you a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement laptop. I still want to use the same model if possible. Thanks for the quick response.
We have processed your replacement order. You will receive tracking details via email shortly, and the faulty unit can be returned with the pre-paid label.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and everything is working well. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us anytime if you have more questions or issues.
